useCase.name: Student takes an exam
useCase.trigger: Student selects and starts an exam on the system.

mainSequence.step: System displays list of available exams.
Student selects an exam from the list.
System validates if selected exam is open for submission.
If yes, system builds the exam for the student to take.
Student progresses through exam by answering questions.
System validates each question submitted by the student.
System saves the completed exam grade.
System provides feedback and grade to student.
